entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
CALM WINDS

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS AROUND 60
